description_html:
The combination of wood, steel and leather define this new collection of tiered, utilitarian side tables.
Black steel pairs with leather in ten hues and three varieties of solid wood for a customizable look.
The round, vertical shaft is a stabilizer to reduce vibration and also a structure for a pivot hinge that
supports a third, optional swing-out tray. A version with only the top tray, called Solist, is also
available and is meant to slide under the legs of a sofa.
Materials: Black steel, vegetable tanned leather and wood in walnut, oxidized walnut or white oak
Dimension: Available in a variety of diameters from 19” - 26” and heights of 15” to 24”
Retail pricing starts at $3250
